description: Options for specifying default footnote formatting.

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the FootnoteOption (a Application or Document).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: The footnote numbering style. Can return: FootnoteNumberingStyle enumerator or String.
properties.name: footnoteNumberingStyle

properties.description: The number at which to start footnote numbering.
properties.name: startAt

properties.description: The point at which to restart footnote numbering. Can return: FootnoteRestarting enumerator or String.
properties.name: restartNumbering

properties.description: The position of the footnote prefix and/or suffix. Can return: FootnotePrefixSuffix enumerator or String.
properties.name: showPrefixSuffix

properties.description: The prefix text of the footnote. (Limit: 0 to 100 characters)
properties.name: prefix

properties.description: The suffix text of the footnote. (Limit: 0 to 100 characters)
properties.name: suffix

properties.description: The paragraph style to apply to footnotes. Note: The space before and after the paragraph defined in the paragraph style is ignored for footnotes. To define space above and between footnotes, see spacer and space between.
properties.name: footnoteTextStyle

properties.description: The character style to apply to footnote reference numbers in the main text.
properties.name: footnoteMarkerStyle

properties.description: The position of footnote reference numbers in the main text. Can return: FootnoteMarkerPositioning enumerator or String.
properties.name: markerPositioning

properties.description: The text to insert between the footnote marker number and the footnote text. (Range: 0 to 100 characters)
properties.name: separatorText

properties.description: The amount of vertical space between footnotes. Note: The space before and space after defined for the paragraph style applied to the footnote is ignored.
properties.name: spaceBetween

properties.description: The minimum amount of vertical space between the bottom of the text column and the first footnote. Note: The space before amount defined in the paragraph style applied to the footnote is ignored for the first footnote.
properties.name: spacer

properties.description: The distance between the top of the footnote container and the footnote text.
properties.name: footnoteFirstBaselineOffset

properties.description: The minimum distance between the baseline of the text and the top of the footnote container.
properties.name: footnoteMinimumFirstBaselineOffset

properties.description: If true, footnotes at the end of the story are placed just below the text. If false, footnotes at the end of the story are placed at the bottom of the column.
properties.name: eosPlacement

properties.description: If true, footnotes cannot split across columns. If false, footnotes flow into succeeding columns when the footnote text causes the footnote area to expand upward to reach the footnote reference number in the main text.
properties.name: noSplitting

properties.description: If true, draws a rule between the text and the first footnote in the column.
properties.name: ruleOn

properties.description: The stroke type of the rule above the first footnote in a column. Note: Valid when rule on is true. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.
properties.name: ruleType

properties.description: The stroke weight of the rule above the first footnote in the column. (Range: 0 to 1000) Note: Valid when rule on is true.
properties.name: ruleLineWeight

properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of the rule above the first footnote in the column. Note: Valid when rule on is true. Can return: Swatch or String.
properties.name: ruleColor

properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke gap of the rule above the first footnote in the column. Note: Valid when rule type is not solid. Can return: Swatch or String.
properties.name: ruleGapColor

properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the rule above the first footnote in the column. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when rule on is true.
properties.name: ruleTint

properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the gap color of the rule above the first footnote in the column. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when rule type is not solid.
properties.name: ruleGapTint

properties.description: If true, overprints the gap color of the rule above the first footnote in the column. Note: Valid when rule type is not solid.
properties.name: ruleGapOverprint

properties.description: If true, overprints the rule above the first footnote in the column. Note: Valid when rule on is true.
properties.name: ruleOverprint

properties.description: The amount to left indent the rule above the first footnote in the column. Note: Valid when rule on is true.
properties.name: ruleLeftIndent

properties.description: The length of the rule above the first footnote in the column. Note: Valid when rule on is true.
properties.name: ruleWidth

properties.description: The vertical offset of the rule above the first footnote in the column. Note: Valid when rule on is true.
properties.name: ruleOffset

properties.description: If true, draws a rule above footnote text that continues from a previous column. Note: Valid when no splitting is false or undefined.
properties.name: continuingRuleOn

properties.description: The stroke type of the rule above continued footnote text. Note: Valid when continuing rule on is true. Can return: StrokeStyle or String.
properties.name: continuingRuleType

properties.description: The stroke weight of the rule above continued footnote text. (Range: 0 to 1000) Note: Valid when continuing rule on is true.
properties.name: continuingRuleLineWeight

properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the rule above continued footnote text. Note: Valid when continuing rule on is true. Can return: Swatch or String.
properties.name: continuingRuleColor

properties.description: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke gap of the rule above continued footnote text. Note: Valid when continuing rule type is not solid. Can return: Swatch or String.
properties.name: continuingRuleGapColor

properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the rule above continued footnote text. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when continuing rule type is not solid.
properties.name: continuingRuleTint

properties.description: The tint (as a percentage) of the gap color of the rule above continued footnote text. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when continuing rule type is not solid.
properties.name: continuingRuleGapTint

properties.description: If true, overprints the rule above continued footnote text. Note: Valid when continuing rule on is true.
properties.name: continuingRuleOverprint

properties.description: If true, overprints the gap color of the rule above continued footnote text. Note: Valid when continuing rule type is not solid.
properties.name: continuingRuleGapOverprint

properties.description: The amount to left indent the rule above continued footnote text. Note: Valid when continuing rule on is true.
properties.name: continuingRuleLeftIndent

properties.description: The length of the rule above continued footnote text. Note: Valid when continuing rule on is true.
properties.name: continuingRuleWidth

properties.description: The vertical offset of the rule above continued footnote text. Note: Valid when continuing rule on is true.
properties.name: continuingRuleOffset

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FootnoteOption.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

name: FootnoteOption
